add_note: INSERT INTO user_notes (user_id, note_name, note_date, full_note) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s)
select_all_notes_by_name: SELECT full_note, note_date FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = %s AND note_name = %s
select_note: SELECT full_note FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = %s AND note_name = %s AND note_date = %s
delete_note_1: DELETE FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = %s AND note_name = %s AND note_date = %s
delete_note_2: DELETE FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = %s AND note_name = %s
select_all_notes: SELECT note_name, note_date FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = %s
